<LinearLayout
  width="@data{width}"
  height="match_content"
  userId="node_dockcviv8fo1"
  orientation="vertical"
  cornerRadius="@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'im'},'6np',@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'topbox'},'12np',@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'search'},'8np','0np'}}}"
  backgroundColor="@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'im'},@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#FFFFFF', '#1E1E1E'},@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'topbox'},@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#FFFFFF', '#1E1E1E'},@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'search'},@triple{@equal{@data{env},'pc'},'#00000000',@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#F2F2F6', '#111213'}},'#00000000'}}}">
 <LinearLayout

   height="match_content"
   orientation="vertical"

   marginBottom="@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'WorkBench'},'12ap',@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'cooperationV2'},'0ap',@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'search'},@triple{@equal{@data{env},'pc'},'0np','12np'},'12np'}}}">
   <FastTextView
     text="客户端版本过低，请升级到最新版客户端"
     maxLines="1"
     width="match_parent"
     height="40np"
     marginBottom="8np"
     cornerRadius="6np"
     lineHeight="40np"
     textSize="14np"
     textColor="@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#3D171A1D', '#52FFFFFF'}"
     textGravity="center"
     backgroundColor="@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#FFF2F2F6', '#FF111213'}"
     lineBreakMode="end"
     visibility="@triple{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene}, 'gone', 'visible'}">

   </FastTextView>
   <LinearLayout
     width="match_parent"
     height="20np"
     orientation="horizontal"
     marginBottom="8np"
     tborderJson="flow"
     visibility="@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'WorkBench'},'gone',@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'cooperationV2'},'gone','visible'}}"
     childGravity="leftCenter">
     <ImageView
       width="16np"
       height="16np"
       marginRight="8np"
       cornerRadius="4np"
       imageUrl="@concat{'@lALPDe7syH8nG_wcHA', ''}"
       visibility="@triple{'@lALPDe7syH8nG_wcHA', 'visible', 'gone'}">

     </ImageView>
     <FastTextView
       text="@toStr{@data{data.cardData.title}}"
       maxLines="1"
       width="match_content"
       height="match_content"
       textSize="@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'topbox'},'14np','15np'}"
       textColor="@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#171A1D', '#EEF2F8'}"
       lineBreakMode="end">

     </FastTextView>
     <FastTextView
       text="@toStr{@data{data.cardData.tag}}"
       textSize="10np"
       textColor="#007FFF"
       maxLines="1"
       lineBreakMode="end"
       width="match_content"
       height="16np"
       lineHeight="14np"
       marginLeft="8np"
       marginRight="8np"
       paddingLeft="4np"
       paddingRight="4np"
       paddingTop="2np"
       paddingBottom="2np"
       cornerRadius="4np"
       borderWidth="1np"
       borderColor="#7A007FFF"
       backgroundColor="#00000000"
       visibility="@triple{@toStr{@data{data.cardData.tag}}, 'visible' , 'gone'}">

     </FastTextView>
     <LinearLayout
       childGravity="rightCenter"
       width="match_content"
       height="20np"
       weight="1"
       marginLeft="4np">

     </LinearLayout>
     <DDIconView
       gravity="rightCenter"
       width="match_content"
       height="match_content"
       marginLeft="6np"
       textSize="16np"
       text="::icon_wd_close::"
       textColor="@dtDarkModeAdapter{'#66171A1D', '#66EEF2F8'}"
       visibility="gone"
       onTap="@dtConfirm{@dtMapAppend{null,'title',@dtMapAppend{null,'zh_CN','关闭置顶卡片','ZH_CN','关闭置顶卡片','zh_TW','関闭置顶卡片','ZH_TW','関闭置顶卡片','en_US','Close Top Card','EN_US','Close Top Card','ja_JP','Close Top Card','JA_JP','Close Top Card','vi_VN','Close Top Card','VI_VN','Close Top Card'},'message',@dtMapAppend{null,'zh_CN','仅对自己关闭此张置顶卡片','ZH_CN','仅对自己关闭此张置顶卡片','zh_TW','僅對自己關閉此张置頂卡片','ZH_TW','僅對自己關閉此张置頂卡片','en_US','Close this top card only for yourself','EN_US','Close this top card only for yourself','ja_JP','Close this top card only for yourself','JA_JP','Close this top card only for yourself','vi_VN','Close this top card only for yourself','VI_VN','Close this top card only for yourself'},'confirmAction','dtSendOutData','confirmText',@dtMapAppend{null,'zh_CN','确认','ZH_CN','确认','zh_TW','确认','ZH_TW','确认','en_US','Confirm','EN_US','Confirm','ja_JP','Confirm','JA_JP','Confirm','vi_VN','Confirm','VI_VN','Confirm'},'confirmData',@dtMapAppend{null,'actionType','0','cardInstanceId',@data{data.cardInstanceId},'actionId','sys_close_one_box','actionData',@dtMapAppend{null,'context',@data{data.renderContext}}},'cancelText',@dtMapAppend{null,'zh_CN','取消','ZH_CN','取消','zh_TW','取消','ZH_TW','取消','en_US','Cancel','EN_US','Cancel','ja_JP','Cancel','JA_JP','Cancel','vi_VN','Cancel','VI_VN','Cancel'}}}">

     </DDIconView>

   </LinearLayout>
   <LinearLayout
     width="match_parent"
     height="@triple{@equal{@data{data.renderContext.bizScene},'topbox'},'66np','match_content'}"
     orientation="horizontal">
     <LinearLayout
       width="match_content"
       height="match_content"
       weight="1"
       orientation="vertical">
       <LinearLayout
         width="match_parent"
         height="match_content"
         orientation="horizontal"
         marginTop="12np"
         marginLeft="12np"
         marginRight="12np"
         userId="node_oclv29olgx1">
         <DDRichTextView
           width="match_parent"
           height="match_content"
           attributedText="@data{data.cardData.markdown}"

           width="match_parent"
           height="match_content"
           text="当前客户端不支持展示该内容，请升级客户端"
           textGravity="center"
           textSize="14np"
           paddingLeft="4np"
           paddingRight="4np"
